articles.title: ‚ÄúDESTROYING the DIVISION?!‚Äù | Strickland Says He's Only One Who Beats Khamzat | BISPING REACTS
articles.description: Khamzat hasn‚Äôt fought since August 2025, and Sean Strickland is calling him out hard. Strickland says he‚Äôs the only man who can beat Khamzat Chimaev and even claims ‚ÄúFluffy‚Äù Hernandez is a better wrestler than Chimaev. Khamzat Chimaev is undefeated, a dominant force at middleweight, and now looks like his cardio issues are solved after going five rounds. If Chimaev fights next, it should be Nassourdine Imavov ‚Äî unless the winner of Sean Strickland vs Brendan ‚ÄúFluffy‚Äù Hernandez jumps the line. Strickland talks, Chimaev dominates, and Dricus Du Plessis needs to defend the UFC middleweight title soon. articles.title: ‚Äú1, 2, 3‚Ä¶ GO‚Äù Third Belt Incoming? | Is Alex Pereira Fighting at Heavyweight?
articles.description: Alex Pereira tweeted ‚Äú1, 2, 3‚Ä¶ go.‚Äù That sounds like one thing ‚Äî a third UFC title. Alex Pereira is already a two division champion, former middleweight champion and light heavyweight champion. With Tom Aspinall recovering and Jon Jones likely retired, the UFC heavyweight title picture is wide open. If Tom Aspinall is sidelined, Alex Pereira vs Ciryl Gane for an interim UFC heavyweight title makes sense. Alex Pereira chasing a third belt would be historic.
